properties.comment: rule in English. File generated from metadata database version 0.3.0 created on the 2022-01-20T16:03:52
properties.entry: ${field.id} is mandatory for a notice with subtype ${notice.id}
${field.id} must be indicated in all notice official languages
The language must be specified for ${field.id}
${field.id} can only be indicated in a language that is part of the notice official languages
${field.id} can only be present once for each language
${field.id} is not allowed for a notice with subtype ${notice.id}
The value of ${field.id} must match the '${rule.pattern_id}' pattern
The element ${rule.element} is mandatory in context ${context}
The element ${rule.element} is not allowed in context ${context}
${field.id} must contain one of the values of the code list ${rule.code_list_id}
